statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -5 \\ -5 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ 4 \\ -4 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 5 \\ 10 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 7 \\ 1 \\ -6 \\ -2 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
